Be it enacted by the Senate and House of Representatives of Congressional the United States of America in Congress assembled, Budget Office Data Access Act. SECTION 1. SHORT TITLE. 5 USC 101 note. This Act may be cited as the ''Congressional Budget Office Data Access Act''. SEC. 2. CONDITIONS OF DISCLOSURE FOR FEDERAL AGENCY INFORMATION WITH THE CONGRESSIONAL BUDGET OFFICE.
